value.title: Wholesale and retail execution in composite models
value.excerpt: In composite models, any query can be executed on the remote model (wholesale execution) or by mixing local and remote engines together (retail execution). This video describes the differences between the wholesale and retail modes in composite models. Article and download: https://sql.bi/736550?aff=yt

value.title: Year-to-date filtering weekdays in DAX
value.excerpt: Time intelligence functions oftentimes hide an automatic ALL statement meant to make time intelligence calculations easier. This video describes this behavior and what to do in case it ends up breaking your calculation. Article and download: https://sql.bi/123591

value.title: Deep dive on how to create Power BI themes with a JSON file
value.excerpt: You can customize the look and feel of the Power BI reports using the formatting pane for each specific visual or you can speed up the process by using a JSON file.  This feature (the JSON file) has been available for quite a while but on the September 2017 update of Power BI Desktop, they allow us to

value.title: What's this Power BI report filtered by???
value.excerpt: Struggling with understanding what is filtering your visual or Power BI report? Patrick walks you through how you can tell what is going on. value.title: Keep most recent record on a table with Power Query | Improved solution
value.excerpt: I have shown you before how to filter a table by its most recent record before, but I have found a cleaner and I think more effective way to do it. (Tests both versions to see what works with your data)  Here is the link to the previous video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hidJ5T_DYQ0  Get download
